item.description:
Hi folks,

Join us for a friendly walk at a great park just outside of New Haven County!

WHEN AND WHERE: This Meetup will take place at Chatfield Hollow, which is a state park located in Killingworth, CT. Meet at the outer parking area at 9:55 or 10:00 and head out at five after.

PLAN: We will make a loop through the woods as well as walk on the road for a bit, to catch sites such as a covered bridge and an old water wheel.

COST: Please contribute one dollar towards the monthly fee that is charged by the Meetup Website.

DIRECTIONS: From I-95: take Exit 63, and follow Route 81 north to Route 80 west. Drive about 1.2 miles west on Route 80 and look for park entrance on your right (it comes up quick). Google map / Directions to park


PARKING NOTE: We should all be able to park in the outer parking area (visible from the road), and walk in together.

Chatfield Hollow State Park

TRAIL MAPS may be available at the entrance, or you can print one out from the park website, if you'd like to get to know the park for future visits.

group.name: New Haven Walks in the Woods

item.name: New Haven Hikers' Walk at Chatfield Hollow
